++ Horticulture Nutrient Calcium


+++ SUMMARY

  * Generally in synthetic water soluble mixtures, calcium nitrate is used. High in Nitrogen, calcium.


+++ DETAILS

++++ NATURAL CALCIUM AMENDMENTS

Poultry manure, wood ashes and seashells or lobster shells are the only common organic sources of enough calcium to be useful when spread in typical amounts.
